name: Skiddy Race
description:
Hey visitor. "Qué Pasa?"

I'm not even gonna try to sell you this game... because it seems that you are here, just to kill your 5 spared minutes. Oh well ...

If you still decide to GET this game, you will enter the darkest tunnel in your life full of traps. But they say that at the end of every tunnel there is a light...even a small one.

Let's see!
